3 import rospy

7 import actionlib
8 import moveit_commander

10 from actionlib_msgs.msg import GoalStatus

12 from niryo_robot_tools_commander.tools_classes import (Gripper,
13  Electromagnet,
14  VacuumPump,
15  NoTool,

17 from niryo_robot_tools_commander.tool_ros_command_interface import ToolRosCommandInterface

24 from std_msgs.msg import Int32

26 from tools_interface.msg import Tool

28 from niryo_robot_tools_commander.msg import ToolAction, ToolResult, ToolActionGoal
29 from niryo_robot_tools_commander.msg import ToolCommand

31 # Services
32 from niryo_robot_msgs.srv import Trigger, SetInt, TriggerResponse, SetIntResponse

34 
35 class ToolsState:
36 
37  def __init__(self, state_dict):
38  self.PING_OK = state_dict["ping_ok"]
39  self.PING_ERROR = state_dict["ping_error"]
40  self.WRONG_ID = state_dict["wrong_id"]
41  self.TIMEOUT = state_dict["timeout"]
42 
43  self.GRIPPER_OPEN = state_dict["gripper_open"]
44  self.GRIPPER_CLOSE = state_dict["gripper_close"]
45 
46  self.VACUUM_PUMP_PULLED = state_dict["vacuum_pump_pulled"]
47  self.VACUUM_PUMP_PUSHED = state_dict["vacuum_pump_pushed"]
48 
49  self.ROS_COMMUNICATION_PROBLEM = state_dict["ros_communication_problem"]
50 
51  def __str__(self):
52  return str(self.__class__) + ": " + str(self.__dict__)

54 
55 class ToolCommander:
56 
57  def __init__(self):
58  self.__tools_state = ToolsState(rospy.get_param("~state_dict"))
59  self.__is_gripper_simulated = rospy.get_param("~simu_gripper")
60  self.__is_use_gazebo = rospy.get_param("~gazebo")
61  self.__hardware_version = rospy.get_param("~hardware_version")
62  move_group_tool_commander_name = rospy.get_param("~move_group_tool_commander_name")
63  reference_frame = rospy.get_param("~reference_frame")
64 
65  rospy.logdebug("ToolCommander.init - state_dict: {}".format(str(self.__tools_state)))
66  rospy.logdebug("ToolCommander.init - simu_gripper: {}".format(self.__is_gripper_simulated))
67  rospy.logdebug("ToolCommander.init - move_group_tool_commander_name: {}".format(move_group_tool_commander_name))
68  rospy.logdebug("ToolCommander.init - reference_frame: {}".format(reference_frame))
69 
70  self.__ros_command_interface = ToolRosCommandInterface(self.__tools_state.ROS_COMMUNICATION_PROBLEM)
71 
72  # Transform Handlers
73  self.__transform_handler = ToolTransformHandler()
74 
75  self.__current_tool = None
76  self.__motor_type = Tool.NO_MOTOR
77 
78  self.__available_tools, self.__dict_commands_string_to_id, self.__dict_tool_str_to_id = self.create_tools()
79 
80  self.__dict_id_commands_to_string = {string: id_ for id_, string in self.__dict_commands_string_to_id.items()}
81 
82  # if gripper simulated, setup variables to control it through moveit
83  if self.__is_use_gazebo and self.__is_gripper_simulated:
84  self.wait_for_controller()
85  # Get Tool MoveGroupCommander
86  self.__tool_simu = moveit_commander.MoveGroupCommander(move_group_tool_commander_name)
87  # Set pose reference frame
88  self.__tool_simu.set_pose_reference_frame(reference_frame)
89 
90  # Subscriber
91  rospy.Subscriber('/niryo_robot_hardware/tools/motor', Tool, self.__callback_current_tool_motor)
92 
93  # Publisher
94  self.__tool_id_publisher = rospy.Publisher('~current_id', Int32, queue_size=10, latch=True)
95 
96  # Services
97  rospy.Service('~update_tool', Trigger, self.__callback_update_tool)
98  rospy.Service('~equip_electromagnet', SetInt, self.__callback_equip_electromagnet)
99 
100  # Action Server
101  self.__current_goal_handle: ServerGoalHandle = None
102 
103  self.__action_server = actionlib.ActionServer('~action_server',
104  ToolAction,
105  self.__callback_goal,
106  auto_start=False)
107  self.__end_init()
108 
109  rospy.logdebug("Poses Handlers - Transform Handler created")
110  # Set a bool to mentioned this node is initialized
111  rospy.set_param('~initialized', True)
112 
113  rospy.loginfo("Tools Commander - Started")
114 
115  def __end_init(self):
116  self.__action_server.start()
117  self.update_tool()
118 
119  @classmethod
120  def wait_for_controller(cls):
121  from actionlib_msgs.msg import GoalStatusArray
122 
123  _ = rospy.wait_for_message("/move_group/status", GoalStatusArray, timeout=120)
124  _ = rospy.wait_for_message("/gazebo_tool_commander/follow_joint_trajectory/status",
125  GoalStatusArray,
126  timeout=120)
127 
128  # Subscriber
129 
130  def __callback_current_tool_motor(self, msg):
131  if self.__current_tool is None or self.__current_tool.get_type() != "electromagnet":
132  tool_id = msg.id if msg.id in self.__available_tools else self.__dict_tool_str_to_id['No Tool']
133  if self.__current_tool is None or tool_id != self.__current_tool.get_id():
134  self.set_tool(self.__available_tools[tool_id])
135  self.__motor_type = msg.motor_type
136  self.__tool_id_publisher.publish(self.__current_tool.get_id())
137 
138  # - Callbacks
139 
140  def __callback_goal(self, goal_handle: ServerGoalHandle):
141  cmd = goal_handle.goal.goal.cmd
142  rospy.logdebug("Tool Commander - received goal : " + str(goal_handle.goal))
143 
144  if self.__current_goal_handle is not None and self.__current_goal_handle.get_goal_status() == GoalStatus.ACTIVE:
145  message = 'Goal has been rejected because there is already a goal handled'
146  self.__current_goal_handle.set_rejected(ToolResult(status=CommandStatus.REJECTED, message=message), message)
147 
148  self.__current_goal_handle = goal_handle
149  self.__current_goal_handle.set_accepted()
150 
151  if self.__current_tool is None:
152  message = "No tool selected"
153  rospy.logwarn(f"Tool Commander - {message}")
154  self.__current_goal_handle.set_aborted(ToolResult(status=CommandStatus.TOOL_FAILURE, message=message),
155  message)
156  return
157 
158  # 1. Check tool id
159  if cmd.tool_id != self.__current_tool.get_id():
160  msg = "Tools ID do not match -> Given : {} Expected : {}".format(cmd.tool_id, self.__current_tool.get_id())
161  rospy.logwarn("Tool Commander - {}".format(msg))
162  self.__current_goal_handle.set_aborted(ToolResult(status=CommandStatus.TOOL_FAILURE, message=msg), msg)
163  return
164 
165  # 2. Check if current tool is active
166  if self.__current_tool.is_active():
167  message = "Tool still active, retry later"
168  self.__current_goal_handle.set_aborted(ToolResult(CommandStatus.TOOL_FAILURE, message=message), message)
169  return
170 
171  # 3. Check cmd_type (if exists, and is available for selected tool)
172  # Skip in case of simulation
173  if cmd.cmd_type not in self.__current_tool.get_available_commands():
174  msg = "Command '{}' is not available for {}".format(self.__dict_id_commands_to_string[cmd.cmd_type],
175  self.__current_tool.name)
176  rospy.logwarn("Tool Commander - {}".format(msg))
177  self.__current_goal_handle.set_aborted(ToolResult(status=CommandStatus.TOOL_FAILURE, message=msg), msg)
178  return
179 
180  # 3.1 Validate params
181  try:
182  self.__current_tool.validate_command(cmd)
183  except ToolValidationException as e:
184  self.__current_goal_handle.set_aborted(ToolResult(status=CommandStatus.TOOL_FAILURE, message=str(e)),
185  str(e))
186  return
187 
188  # 4. Execute cmd -> retrieve cmd name in command list and execute on current tool
189  with self.__current_tool:
190  function_name = self.__dict_id_commands_to_string[cmd.cmd_type]
191  success, message = self.__current_tool(function_name, cmd) # Execute function from name
192 
193  # 5. Return success or error
194  if not success:
195  rospy.loginfo("Tool Commander - error : {}".format(message))
196  self.__current_goal_handle.set_aborted(ToolResult(status=CommandStatus.TOOL_FAILURE, message=message),
197  message)
198 
199  # Gripper simulated
200  if self.__is_use_gazebo:
201  if self.__is_gripper_simulated:
202  if cmd.cmd_type == ToolCommand.OPEN_GRIPPER:
203  self.__tool_simu.set_named_target("open")
204  self.__tool_simu.go()
205  elif cmd.cmd_type == ToolCommand.CLOSE_GRIPPER:
206  self.__tool_simu.set_named_target("close")
207  self.__tool_simu.go()
208 
209  message = "Simulated tool action successfully finished"
210  self.__current_goal_handle.set_succeeded(ToolResult(status=CommandStatus.SUCCESS, message=message),
211  message)
212  return
213  # Simulation mode without gripper
214  else:
215  message = "Tool action successfully finished"
216  self.__current_goal_handle.set_succeeded(ToolResult(status=CommandStatus.SUCCESS, message=message),
217  message)
218  else:
219  message = "Tool action successfully finished"
220  self.__current_goal_handle.set_succeeded(ToolResult(status=CommandStatus.SUCCESS, message=message), message)
221 
222  def __callback_update_tool(self, _req):
223  state, id_ = self.update_tool()
224  if state != self.__tools_state.PING_OK:
225  return TriggerResponse(status=CommandStatus.TOOL_FAILURE, message="Impossible to set new tool")
226 
227  if id_ < 0:
228  id_ = self.__dict_tool_str_to_id['No Tool']
229  elif id_ not in self.__available_tools:
230  # no tool found in available tools
231  return TriggerResponse(status=CommandStatus.TOOL_ID_INVALID,
232  message="This ID does not match any available tool ID")
233 
234  self.set_tool(self.__available_tools[id_])
235 
236  return TriggerResponse(status=CommandStatus.SUCCESS, message="New tool has been set, id : {}".format(id_))
237 
238  def __callback_equip_electromagnet(self, req):
239  id_ = req.value
240  if id_ not in self.__available_tools:
241  # no tool found in available tools
242  return SetIntResponse(status=CommandStatus.TOOL_ID_INVALID,
243  message="This ID does not match any electromagnet ID")
244 
245  self.set_tool(self.__available_tools[id_])
246 
247  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Electromagnet properly equipped"
248 
249  # Functions
250  def create_tools(self):
251  # Get params from rosparams
252  tool_config_dict = rospy.get_param("~tool_list")
253  list_commands_all_tools = rospy.get_param("~command_list")
254 
255  rospy.logdebug("ToolCommander.create_tools - tool_list: {}".format(tool_config_dict))
256  rospy.logdebug("ToolCommander.create_tools - command_list: {}".format(list_commands_all_tools))
257 
258  dict_tools = {}
259  dict_tool_str_to_id = {}
260 
261  for tool in tool_config_dict:
262  (tool_type, tool_id, tool_name, tool_transformation,
263  specs) = (tool[key] for key in ['type', 'id', 'name', 'transformation', 'specs'])
264  tool_transformation = self.__transform_handler.transform_from_dict(tool_transformation)
265  if tool_type == Gripper.get_type():
266  new_tool = Gripper(tool_id,
267  tool_name,
268  tool_transformation,
269  self.__tools_state,
270  self.__ros_command_interface,
271  specs,
272  self.__hardware_version)
273  elif tool_type == Electromagnet.get_type():
274  new_tool = Electromagnet(tool_id,
275  tool_name,
276  tool_transformation,
277  self.__tools_state,
278  self.__ros_command_interface)
279  elif tool_type == VacuumPump.get_type():
280  new_tool = VacuumPump(tool_id,
281  tool_name,
282  tool_transformation,
283  self.__tools_state,
284  self.__ros_command_interface,
285  specs)
286  elif tool_type == NoTool.get_type():
287  new_tool = NoTool(tool_id,
288  tool_name,
289  tool_transformation,
290  self.__tools_state,
291  self.__ros_command_interface)
292  else:
293  rospy.logwarn("Tool Commander - Type not recognized from tool config list : " + str(tool['type']))
294  continue
295 
296  tool_command_list = []
297 
298  for cmd in tool['available_commands']:
299  try:
300  tool_command_list.append(list_commands_all_tools[cmd])
301  except KeyError:
302  rospy.logwarn("Tool Commander - Unknown command : {}".format(cmd))
303  continue
304 
305  new_tool.set_available_commands(tool_command_list)
306 
307  dict_tools[tool_id] = new_tool
308  dict_tool_str_to_id[tool_name] = tool_id
309 
310  return dict_tools, list_commands_all_tools, dict_tool_str_to_id
311 
312  def update_tool(self):
313  return self.__ros_command_interface.ping_dxl_tool()
314 
315  def set_tool(self, tool_name):
316  self.__current_tool = tool_name
317  self.__tool_id_publisher.publish(self.__current_tool.get_id())
318  self.__transform_handler.set_tool(self.__current_tool.transformation)
319 
320 
321 if __name__ == '__main__':
322  sentry_init()
323 
324  rospy.init_node('niryo_robot_tools_commander', anonymous=False, log_level=rospy.INFO)
325 
326  # change logger level according to node parameter
327  log_level = rospy.get_param("~log_level")
328  logger = logging.getLogger("rosout")
329  logger.setLevel(log_level)
330 
331  try:
332  node = ToolCommander()
333  rospy.spin()
334  except rospy.ROSInterruptException:
335  pass
